verbal_utterance: Can you start by picking up the first item on this grocery list from the table?
nonverbal_behavior: Point to the list and then to the table where the items are

verbal_utterance: What list? I don't remember any list.
nonverbal_behavior: looks around the room with a puzzled expression

verbal_utterance: It's okay if you can't remember the list right now. We're going to start with just one item at a time. Can you pick up the box of chopped broccoli from the table?
nonverbal_behavior: Points gently to the location of the broccoli on the table

verbal_utterance: Broccoli? I... what was I doing with the...?
nonverbal_behavior: hand hovering over different items without picking one
